thread.title: LOOK: Steve Harvey, Pia Wurtzbach reunite on stage
thread.title_full: LOOK: Steve Harvey, Pia Wurtzbach reunite on stage

author: Rappler.com
title: LOOK: Steve Harvey, Pia Wurtzbach reunite on stage
text: LOOK: Steve Harvey, Pia Wurtzbach reunite on stage Steve and Pia start rehearsals for the Miss Universe pageant Published 8:51 PM, January 28, 2017 Updated 8:51 PM, January 28, 2017 REHEARSAL TIME Host Steve Harvey and Miss Universe 2015 Pia Wurtzbach rehearse their spiels for the Miss Universe pageant to be held on Monday, January 30. Screengrab from Instagram/@swanbirdnyc MANILA, Philippines – Miss Universe 2015 Pia Wurtzbach was reunited with TV host Steve Harvey as they started rehearsals for the Miss Universe 2016 pageant on Saturday, January 28. Esther Swan, Pia’s manager, posted a photo of the two together at the Mall of Asia Arena. “They are back & ready for anything! [Steve Harvey] [Miss Universe] take the stage once again and rehearse for the Miss Universe telecast Live from Manila.” A photo posted by Esther Swan (@swanbirdnyc) on Jan 28, 2017 at 1:52am PST Steve arrived Saturday morning, two days before coronation night. Department of Tourism officials and former Ilocos Sur governor Luis “Chavit” Singson, who brought the pageant to the country, welcomed him upon his arrival. Steve and Pia were last seen together when she guested on his show. He apologized for the gaffe he committed, when he accidentally announced Miss Colombia Ariadna Gutierrez as the winner. Steve has also since apologized to Ariadna. – Rappler.com Miss Universe 2016 is powered by PLDT Home Fibr, Home’s most powerful broadband, now reaching 2.5 Million homes. As low as P1,899. Visit www.pldthome.com. HOW DOES THIS STORY MAKE YOU FEEL? Happy
